amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to express a Sense of Congress that all US allies in the Middle East should publicly and unequivocally condemn the antisemitism displayed by Iranian-backed terror groups, including Hamas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 422 - 1, 1 Present (Roll no. 681).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 422 - 1, 1 Present (Roll no. 681).
